name: Zombo - Space Marine Killer
description:
A "short" top-down shooter Zombo has resin from the dead and ready to avenge his fallen brothers. Using special AK-47, blast your way through hordes of space marines. Fail and you should die (again). NOTE: This is a prototype that was created during a game jam. There will be plenty of bugs left over from the space marines. Based on the community feedback, an entire game may be created to continue Zombo's journey. Gamepad or mouse can be used to move around and shoot. Unlimited ammo, but only 7 health pick-ups for the entire game. Good Luck! Available Languages:
  • English GUI
  • (No dialogue)
Features:
  • Each wave will increase the number of space marines that come after you.
  • Space marines rez in different corners of the game.
  • Health kit limits for the entire game.
